short.ar: تنزيل صور مجمعة + مقاطع فيديو من لوحات Pinterest. حفظ بصيغة zip أو pdf أو print.
short.am: ምስሎችን + ቪዲዮዎችን ከPinterest ቦርዶች በጅምላ አውርዱ። እንደ ዚፕ፣ ፒዲኤፍ ወይም ህትመት ያስቀምጡ።
short.bg: Групово изтегляне на изображения + видеоклипове от дъски на Pinterest. Запазете като zip, pdf или отпечатайте.
short.bn: Pinterest বোর্ড থেকে প্রচুর পরিমাণে ছবি + ভিডিও ডাউনলোড করুন। জিপ, পিডিএফ বা মুদ্রণ হিসাবে সংরক্ষণ করুন।
short.ca: Descàrrega massiva d'imatges i vídeos dels taulers de Pinterest. Desa com a zip, pdf o imprimeix.
short.cs: Hromadné stahování obrázků a videí z nástěnek Pinterestu. Uložit jako zip, pdf nebo tisk.
short.da: Bulk download billeder + videoer fra Pinterest boards. Gem som zip, pdf eller print.
short.de: Laden Sie Bilder und Videos in großen Mengen von Pinterest-Boards herunter. Als ZIP-Datei, PDF oder Ausdruck speichern.
short.el: Μαζική λήψη εικόνων + βίντεο από πίνακες Pinterest. Αποθήκευση ως zip, pdf ή εκτύπωση.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Download full size images + videos from Pinterest boards. Bulk download / select pictures, videos & gifs. Save as zip, pdf or print.
short.es,es_419: Descarga masiva de imágenes y videos de tableros de Pinterest. Guardar como zip, pdf o imprimir.
short.et: Piltide ja videote hulgiallalaadimine Pinteresti tahvlitelt. Salvestage zip-, pdf- või prindivormingus.
short.fa: دانلود انبوه تصاویر + فیلم از تابلوهای Pinterest. ذخیره به صورت zip، pdf یا چاپ.
short.fi: Kuvien ja videoiden joukkolataus Pinterest-tauluilta. Tallenna zip-, pdf- tai tulostettavaksi.
short.fil: Maramihang pag-download ng mga larawan + video mula sa mga Pinterest board. I-save bilang zip, pdf o print.
short.fr: Téléchargez en masse des images + des vidéos à partir de tableaux Pinterest. Enregistrer au format zip, pdf ou imprimer.
short.gu: Pinterest બોર્ડ્સમાંથી જથ્થાબંધ ડાઉનલોડ છબીઓ + વિડિઓઝ. ઝિપ, પીડીએફ અથવા પ્રિન્ટ તરીકે સાચવો.
short.he: הורדה בכמות גדולה של תמונות + סרטונים מלוחות Pinterest. שמור כ-zip, pdf או הדפסה.
short.hi: Pinterest बोर्डों से बल्क डाउनलोड चित्र + वीडियो। ज़िप, पीडीएफ या प्रिंट के रूप में सहेजें।
short.hr: Skupno preuzimanje slika + videozapisa s Pinterest ploča. Spremite kao zip, pdf ili isprintajte.
short.hu: Képek és videók tömeges letöltése a Pinterest tábláiról. Mentés zip, pdf vagy nyomtatott formában.
short.id: Unduh massal gambar + video dari papan Pinterest. Simpan sebagai zip, pdf atau cetak.

short.ja: Pinterest ボードから画像とビデオを一括ダウンロードします。 zip、pdf、または印刷で保存します。
short.kn: Pinterest ಬೋರ್ಡ್‌ಗಳಿಂದ ಬೃಹತ್ ಡೌನ್‌ಲೋಡ್ ಚಿತ್ರಗಳು + ವೀಡಿಯೊಗಳು. ಜಿಪ್, ಪಿಡಿಎಫ್ ಅಥವಾ ಪ್ರಿಂಟ್ ಆಗಿ ಉಳಿಸಿ.
short.ko: Pinterest 보드에서 대량 다운로드 이미지 + 동영상. zip, pdf 또는 인쇄로 저장합니다.
short.lt: Masinis vaizdų ir vaizdo įrašų atsisiuntimas iš Pinterest lentų. Išsaugoti kaip zip, pdf arba spausdinti.
short.lv: Lielapjoma attēlu un videoklipu lejupielāde no Pinterest dēļiem. Saglabāt kā zip, pdf vai izdrukāt.
short.ml: Pinterest ബോർഡുകളിൽ നിന്നുള്ള ചിത്രങ്ങളും വീഡിയോകളും ബൾക്ക് ഡൗൺലോഡ് ചെയ്യുക. zip, pdf അല്ലെങ്കിൽ പ്രിന്റ് ആയി സംരക്ഷിക്കുക.
short.mr: Pinterest बोर्डवरून मोठ्या प्रमाणात प्रतिमा + व्हिडिओ डाउनलोड करा. झिप, पीडीएफ किंवा प्रिंट म्हणून सेव्ह करा.
short.ms: Muat turun pukal imej + video daripada papan Pinterest. Simpan sebagai zip, pdf atau cetak.
short.nl: Afbeeldingen en video's in bulk downloaden van Pinterest-borden. Opslaan als zip, pdf of print.
short.no: Masselast ned bilder + videoer fra Pinterest-tavler. Lagre som zip, pdf eller print.
short.pl: Masowe pobieranie obrazów i filmów z tablic Pinterest. Zapisz jako ZIP, PDF lub wydrukuj.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Baixe imagens e vídeos em massa de painéis do Pinterest. Salve como zip, pdf ou imprima.
short.ro: Descărcați în bloc imagini + videoclipuri de pe panourile Pinterest. Salvați ca zip, pdf sau tipăriți.
short.ru: Массовая загрузка изображений и видео с досок Pinterest. Сохраните в формате zip, pdf или распечатайте.
short.sk: Hromadné sťahovanie obrázkov a videí z násteniek Pinterestu. Uložiť ako zip, pdf alebo vytlačiť.
short.sl: Množični prenos slik in videoposnetkov s plošč Pinterest. Shrani kot zip, pdf ali natisni.
short.sr: Масовно преузимајте слике и видео записе са Пинтерест плоча. Сачувајте као зип, пдф или одштампајте.
short.sv: Massnedladdning av bilder + videor från Pinterest-tavlor. Spara som zip, pdf eller skriv ut.
short.sw: Pakua picha + video nyingi kutoka kwa bodi za Pinterest. Hifadhi kama zip, pdf au uchapishe.
short.ta: Pinterest பலகைகளிலிருந்து படங்கள் + வீடியோக்களை மொத்தமாகப் பதிவிறக்கவும். ஜிப், பிடிஎஃப் அல்லது அச்சாக சேமிக்கவும்.
short.te: Pinterest బోర్డుల నుండి బల్క్ డౌన్‌లోడ్ చిత్రాలు + వీడియోలు. జిప్, పిడిఎఫ్ లేదా ప్రింట్‌గా సేవ్ చేయండి.
short.th: ดาวน์โหลดรูปภาพ + วิดีโอจำนวนมากจากบอร์ด Pinterest บันทึกเป็น zip, pdf หรือพิมพ์
short.tr: Pinterest panolarından görüntüleri ve videoları toplu olarak indirin. Zip, pdf veya çıktı olarak kaydedin.
short.uk: Масове завантаження зображень + відео з дошок Pinterest. Зберегти як zip, pdf або роздрукувати.
short.vi: Tải xuống hàng loạt hình ảnh + video từ bảng Pinterest. Lưu dưới dạng zip, pdf hoặc in.
short.zh_CN: 从 Pinterest 看板批量下载图片和视频。另存为 zip、pdf 或打印。
short.zh_TW: 從 Pinterest 看板批量下載圖片和視頻。另存為 zip、pdf 或打印。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Please note: Pin Toolbox is a paid Chrome extension. When you add it to Chrome it will be available in free demo mode - limited to the first 15 pins of any board. Upgrade to Pro to unlock unlimited downloading.

Are you tired of wasting time downloading Pinterest images one by one? With Pin Toolbox you can easily download any Pinterest board with just a few clicks.

Pin Toolbox is the ultimate extension for Pinterest power users. Whether you're an interior designer, stylist, or creative professional, Pin Toolbox can save you time and streamline your Pinterest workflow.

Here's how it works:
1. Install the Pin Toolbox extension in your browser.
2. Visit any board on Pinterest that you wish to download from.
3. Open Pin Toolbox, and it will extract all the images and videos from the board.
4. Select your favorite pins or select all of them at once. You can also select by board section.
5. Click the download button, and all the selected files will be saved to a single .zip folder with smart file naming and numbering for easy import into Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, or Canva.


Features:
- Bulk download whole Pinterest boards or select specific images and videos.
- Save full-size photos and videos.
- Download sections of Pinterest boards.
- Download over 5000 pins at a time (Pro users).
- Download to a .zip folder or as a PDF.
- Print Pinterest boards
- Smart file naming and numbering for easy import into Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, or Canva.

Streamline your Pinterest workflow and save time with Pin Toolbox. By using our extension, you agree to our privacy policy (https://pintoolbox.com/privacy). 

Pin Toolbox is not affiliated with Pinterest, Inc. All Rights Reserved. © 2023 Pin Toolbox.
long.en,en_AU:
Please note: Pin Toolbox is a paid Chrome extension. When you add it to Chrome it will be available in free demo mode - limited to the first 15 pins of any board. Upgrade to Pro to unlock unlimited downloading.

Are you tired of wasting time downloading Pinterest images one by one? With Pin Toolbox, you can easily download any Pinterest board with just a few clicks.

Pin Toolbox is the Pinterest downloader used by Pinterest power users. Whether you're an interior designer, stylist, or creative professional, Pin Toolbox can save you time and streamline your Pinterest workflow.

Here's how it works:
1. Add Pin Toolbox extension in your browser.
2. Visit any board on Pinterest that you wish to download from.
3. Open Pin Toolbox, and it will extract all the images and videos from the board.
4. Select your favorite pins or select all of them at once. You can also select by board section.
5. Click the download button, and all the selected files will be saved to a single .zip folder with smart file naming and numbering for easy import into Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, or Canva.


Features:
- Bulk download whole Pinterest boards or select specific images and videos. 
- Save full-size photos and videos.
- Download sections of Pinterest boards.
- Download over 5000 pins at a time (Pro users).
- Download to a .zip folder or as a PDF.
- Print Pinterest boards
- Smart file naming and numbering for easy import into Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, or Canva.

Pin Toolbox was built to be a powerful, yet easy to use Pinterest downloader. It is designed specifically for creative professionals that use Pinterest day in day out and need a downloader that works reliably every time, downloading all the full size pins from any board. It is maintained and updated regularly. If you have any feature requests be sure to send them through to thomas@pintoolbox.com. 

Streamline your Pinterest workflow and save time with Pin Toolbox, the ultimate Pinterest downloader. By using Pin Toolbox - Pinterest Board Downloader, you agree to our privacy policy (https://pintoolbox.com/privacy).

Pin Toolbox - Pinterest Board Downloader is not affiliated with Pinterest, Inc. All Rights Reserved. © 2024 Pin Toolbox.
